document.docTitle: Dianous banghaasi subsp. banghaasi banghaasi Bernhauer 1916
document.masterDocTitle: The genus Dianous in Zhejiang, East China (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae)

Puthz , Tang , Cheng & Shuai leg. ( SHNU )
.

Measurements. BL: 5.3–7.2 mm , FL: 3.0– 3.3 mm . HW: 1.04–1.18 mm , PL: 0.92–1.02 mm , PW: 0.83–0.94 mm , EL: 1.39–1.55 mm , EW: 1.33–1.46 mm , SL: 1.18–1.33 mm . Head 0.74–0.81 times as wide as elytra; Pronotum 1.06–1.13 times as long as wide; Elytra 1.02–1.07 times as long as wide.
Distribution. China ( Shandong , Zhejiang , Jiangxi , Hunan , Guizhou , Guangxi , Fujian , Guangdong , Sichuan ).
